login.no_account: Don't have an account? Sign up

signup.has_account: Already have an account? Log in

forgot.check_email: Check your email. You should have received a code to reset your password.

danger_zone.reset_settings_desc: Use this option if you want to reset your settings to default values. This will not delete your solves or sessions, only your local settings.
danger_zone.reset_settings_confirm_desc: You are about to reset your settings to default values. Custom cube types will not be affected.
danger_zone.delete_account_warning: Be careful here. If you click the button below, you will delete your entire account. All your solves, session data, statistics, etc. will be permanently deleted. Proceed with caution.
danger_zone.delete_account_confirm_desc: Be careful here. You are about to delete your entire account. All your Zkt-Timer data will be deleted and cannot be recovered.

admin_announcements.title: Announcement Management
admin_announcements.subtitle: Manage all announcements in the system from here.
admin_announcements.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this announcement?

create_announcement.title: Create New Announcement
create_announcement.draft_notification_warning: (Notifications cannot be sent for draft announcements)

create_room.title: Create New Room
create_room.subtitle: Compete with your friends!
create_room.private_desc: Only those who know the password can join

trainer.title: Algorithm Trainer
trainer.description: This page will be available very soon! üöÄ F2, OLL, PLL, ZBLL and more algorithm sets, smart cube support, and advanced performance tracking features coming soon!
trainer.feature_algorithms_desc: OLL, PLL, ZBLL and more algorithm sets
trainer.feature_smart_cube_desc: Real-time analysis with GAN smart cube support
trainer.footer: This page will be available very soon! üöÄ
trainer.select_algorithms_hint: Select a category and algorithms to start training
trainer.select_algorithm: Select an algorithm to view statistics
trainer.enter_alg_placeholder: Enter alg e.g., (R U R' U) (R U2' R')
trainer.export_desc: Download all your algorithms and statistics as a JSON file to your device. You can keep this file as a backup or transfer it to another device.
trainer.import_desc: Select a previously exported JSON file to restore your algorithms. Your current data will be replaced with the data in the file.

notification_prefs.elo_refund: ELO refund after playing with a cheater
notification_prefs.marketing_emails: Tips, updates, and other emails from Zkt-Timer

orientation_warning.title: Please Rotate Your Device
orientation_warning.text: ZKT-Timer is designed for the best experience in portrait mode on mobile devices.

appearance.timer_modules_desc: Change the number of modules shown on the timer page. Note that this is the *maximum* number of modules shown (based on your window size).
appearance.timer_layout_desc: Change the appearance of your timer. If you have a smaller screen, you may want to put modules to the left or right.
appearance.timer_background_desc: Change the background color or image of the timer.
appearance.timer_font_desc: The font of the large timer you see on the timer page
appearance.timer_font_size_desc: The font size of the large time you see on the timer page
appearance.scramble_font_size_desc: The font size of the scramble you see on the timer page
appearance.smart_cube_size_desc: Adjust the size of the smart cube on the homepage.

timer_settings.decimal_points_desc: How many decimal points to show on the timer page
timer_settings.input_type_desc: Choose between using your keyboard (spacebar), StackMat, or Smart Cube to start the timer.
timer_settings.freeze_time_desc: How many seconds to hold the spacebar before the timer starts.
timer_settings.cube_types_desc: Add custom cube types with or without scrambles
timer_settings.manage_cube_types_modal_desc: You can use custom scramble types for events not listed by default. For example 8x8 or Examinx or whatever comes to mind
timer_settings.space_with_smart_desc: Use the spacebar like normal cubes instead of detecting when a solve starts/ends by smart cube moves.
timer_settings.zero_out_time_desc: Instead of showing the time of your last solve, the timer updates to 0.00 after the solve.
timer_settings.require_period_desc: Turn this off if you want manually entered times to be automatically divided by 100
timer_settings.confirm_delete_solve_desc: Show a confirmation dialog before deleting a solve
timer_settings.confirm_delete_season_desc: Show a confirmation dialog before deleting all solves in the selected session
timer_settings.pb_confetti_desc: Show confetti when you beat your personal best
timer_settings.use_2d_scramble_visual_desc: Show 2D unfolded net for NxN cubes (2x2‚Äì7x7) instead of 3D
timer_settings.inspection_desc: Limit inspection time. Good for preparing for competitions.
timer_settings.play_sound_desc: Play an audio alert when 8 and 12 seconds have passed
timer_settings.inspection_auto_start_desc: Automatically start when inspection time runs out
timer_settings.stackmat_options_desc: These options will be used when your timer input type is set to StackMat
timer_settings.mic_access: Allow microphone access (StackMat's data transmission method)
timer_settings.stackmat_auto_inspection_desc: Automatically starts inspection time after the mat is reset.
timer_settings.stackmat_select: Select your StackMat device. Usually named "USB Audio Device"
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_subtitle: There is important information you should know about this feature.
timer_settings.stackmat_step1: Press the reset button on the mat after completing your solve
timer_settings.stackmat_step2: After the time you set (default 2 seconds), inspection starts automatically
timer_settings.stackmat_step3: If you start the timer within this time, inspection is cancelled
timer_settings.stackmat_limitation_text: If you cancel inspection with the ESC key, since no new signal comes from the mat, inspection won't start even if you press reset again. In this case, you need to start inspection from the keyboard (Space) or do a new solve.
timer_settings.stackmat_protocol_limitation: This limitation comes from the StackMat protocol and has no software solution.
timer_settings.stackmat_critical_warning: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL WARNING: Please DO NOT RESET on StackMat until the time has fully stopped after solving. This may cause the StackMat signal to synchronize incorrectly and may cause some errors in inspection time. We apologize for these protocol errors beyond our control.
timer_settings.use_space_with_smart_cube_desc: Use the spacebar like normal cubes instead of detecting when a solve starts/ends by smart cube moves.
timer_settings.zero_out_time_after_solve_desc: Instead of showing the time of your last solve, the timer updates to 0.00 after the solve.
timer_settings.auto_inspection_start_desc: Automatically starts inspection time after the mat is reset.
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_desc: There is important information you should know about this feature.
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_step1: Press the reset button on the mat after completing your solve
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_step2: After the time you set (default 2 seconds), inspection starts automatically
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_step3: If you start the timer within this time, inspection is cancelled
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_limitation_desc: If you cancel inspection with the ESC key, since no new signal comes from the mat, inspection won't start even if you press reset again. In this case, you need to start inspection from the keyboard (Space) or do a new solve.
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_protocol_note: This limitation comes from the StackMat protocol and has no software solution.
timer_settings.stackmat_warning_critical: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL WARNING: Please DO NOT RESET on StackMat until the time has fully stopped after solving. This may cause the StackMat signal to synchronize incorrectly and may cause some errors in inspection time. We apologize for these protocol errors beyond our control.

data_settings.force_reload_desc: If your data or settings are out of sync, you can force reload to re-sync with the database.
data_settings.export_data_desc: This data can serve as a backup for your solve and session data that can be imported later if needed.
data_settings.export_success: All solve and session data downloaded successfully.
data_settings.import_data_desc: Import data from csTimer or Zkt-Timer
data_settings.reset_settings_desc: Reset everything in settings to default values (except custom cube types)
data_settings.reset_settings_confirm_desc: Be careful. You are about to reset your settings to default values. Custom cube types will not be affected.
data_settings.review_description: Make sure the numbers below are correct. Then import the data!
data_settings.session_import_failed: Session import failed: {{count}} chunk errors! Solve import cancelled.
data_settings.retry_failed_chunks: Re-upload the file for failed chunks

timer_modules.stackmat_place_hands: Place your hands on the StackMat to start

sessions.delete_confirm_desc: Be careful. You are about to delete the session "{{name}}". This action cannot be undone.
sessions.delete_selected_desc: {{count}} sessions will be deleted: {{names}}. This action cannot be undone.
sessions.merge_confirm_desc: Be careful. You are about to merge "{{source}}" into "{{target}}". "{{source}}" will be deleted after the merge.
sessions.cannot_delete_last: You cannot delete the last remaining session!
sessions.cannot_delete_all: You cannot delete all sessions! At least one session must remain.
sessions.bulk_delete_confirm: You are deleting multiple sessions. This action cannot be undone. Do you want to continue?
sessions.create_session_error: Server Error: Could not create session
sessions.create_new_session_desc: Sessions in Zkt-Timer can have multiple cube types. You can split sessions however you like: by cube type, by day, etc.
sessions.cube_type_info: Don't worry :) This can be changed later

play.1v1_description: Play head-to-head with another user. First to 5 wins takes it.
play.elimination_description: Start with 30 seconds, go 5% faster with each solve. How many can you do?

match.players_description: The number of players in this match. This many players <bold>must</bold> join before the match starts.

rooms.description: Create a room to compete with your friends or join an existing one.
rooms.no_rooms_desc: Start the fun by creating a new room!
rooms.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the room "{{name}}"?
rooms.cube_change_warning: Changing the event/cube type will reset all solves and scores in the room. Do you confirm?
rooms.password_required: This room is protected. Please enter the password to join.
rooms.solve_cube_for_scramble: Solve the cube for a new scramble!
rooms.next_scramble_tooltip: Move everyone to the next scramble
rooms.host_start_instruction: Click the "Start" button when you are ready.
rooms.guest_wait_instruction: Wait until the host starts the room.

profile.publish_pbs_desc: Please make sure the following solves are legitimate and belong to you.
profile.publish_wca_records_desc: Display your official WCA records on your profile.
profile.no_personal_records: You have no published personal records yet.
profile.no_wca_records: You have no published WCA records yet.
profile.set_username_first: You must set a username before you can publish your times.
profile.no_solves_to_publish: You don't have any solves yet.
profile.no_announcement_history: You haven't viewed any announcements yet
profile.no_wca_records_yet: You don't have any WCA records yet or records haven't been fetched.
profile.wca_records_info: Your records are automatically fetched from the WCA database. Only select the records you want to publish.

common.new_version_available: A new version is available. Would you like to refresh the page?

admin_users.ban_description: If this user has violated a rule, you can ban them from here. You can ban for a specific duration or permanently

admin_email.subtitle: Send bulk or individual emails to users.
admin_email.subject: Subject
admin_email.tip_subject: Do not use ALL CAPS or excessive exclamation marks (!!!) in the subject line
admin_email.tip_links: Make sure links redirect to zktimer.app
admin_email.send_confirm: {{count}} emails will be sent. Do you want to continue?
admin_email.send_error: Email sending failed. Please try again.

seo.home_title: Zkt-Timer | The Most Advanced Rubik's Cube Platform
seo.home_description: The most advanced Rubik's cube platform! Professional timer, live race rooms, smart cube support, detailed statistics and rankings. 3x3, 2x2, 4x4 and all WCA categories.
seo.timer_description: Professional Rubik's cube timer. Millisecond precision, WCA scramble algorithms, smart cube support and detailed performance analysis. The best timer for speedcubing.
seo.login_description: Log in to your ZKT Timer account. Save your solves, track your stats and take your place in the rankings.
seo.signup_description: Join the largest Rubik's cube community! Create a free account, save your solves and compete with other cubers.
seo.forgot_password_description: Reset your ZKT Timer account password. Set a new password with the link sent to your email.
seo.rooms_description: Race other cubers in real time! Create rooms with friends or join open rooms. The best platform for speedcubing competition.
seo.settings_description: Customize your timer settings, appearance and account preferences.
seo.user_profile_description: {{username}}'s Rubik's cube profile. Records, solve statistics and competition history.
seo.trainer_description: Learn F2L, OLL, PLL and more algorithms. Train with interactive 3D cube and improve your speed.
seo.stats_description: Analyze your Rubik's cube performance. Averages, best times, graphs and detailed statistics.
seo.solves_description: View all your Rubik's cube solves. Performance analysis with scramble, time and solve details.
seo.leaderboards_description: The fastest Rubik's cube solvers! Single and Average records, category-based rankings.
seo.demo_description: Try ZKT Timer for free! Explore timer features without creating an account.

quick_controls.extras_description: Toggle extra features (multiple can be selected)
quick_controls.timer_type_description: Select timer type (only one can be active)

room_timer.place_hands_on_timer: Place your hands on the timer to start
room_timer.place_hands_on_stackmat: Place your hands on the StackMat timer to start
room_timer.smart_cube_3x3_only: Smart cube is only supported for 3x3x3

smart_cube.no_smart_cubes_yet: You haven't connected a smart cube yet
smart_cube.scanning_desc: Make sure your device is powered on and nearby.
smart_cube.scan_failed_desc: No supported device was found nearby. Make sure your device is turned on and close to your phone.
smart_cube.abort_confirm_title: Do you really want to abort this solve?
smart_cube.abort_discard: Yes, but don't save this solve
smart_cube.cube_mismatch_message: The cube needs to be solved before we can proceed

stackmat.description: StackMat connects to your computer via audio input. Click the dropdown below and select your StackMat. Note that the input name may be something like "USB Audio Device" rather than "StackMat".
stackmat.not_supported_mobile: StackMat timer is not supported on mobile app
stackmat.permission_denied: Permission denied. Allow microphone access from your OS settings

room_settings.select_timer_type: Select timer type (only one can be active)

integration.disconnect_confirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this account?
integration.wca_description: Increase credibility by linking your WCA account and displaying your official records.

features.timer_desc: A clean, distraction-free interface with millisecond precision. Full control with keyboard shortcuts.
features.stats_desc: Track your progress with charts. View your PBs, averages (AO5, AO12, AO100) and trends.
features.smart_cube_desc: Connect your Bluetooth-enabled cube and analyze your moves, TPS and turn errors.
features.rooms_desc: Create private rooms with friends or compete in public rooms. Live rankings and instant chat.

time_display.turn_smart_cube_to_start: Turn the smart cube to start
time_display.scramble_smart_cube_to_start: Scramble the smart cube to start

theme_options.advanced_desc: After opening the color palette and selecting a color, click outside the palette to close it. Then press the 'Apply Changes' button.

friendship.request_cancelled: Friend request to {{username}} has been cancelled

pro_page.title: Pro
pro_page.subtitle: Take your cubing to the next level with exclusive Pro features designed for serious speedcubers.
pro_page.feature_ai_coach_desc: Get personalized training plans and real-time analysis from our AI assistant that learns your solving patterns.
pro_page.feature_trainer_desc: Access specialized training modules for F2L, OLL, PLL and more with adaptive difficulty.
pro_page.feature_stats_desc: Deep dive into your performance with detailed charts, trend analysis, and solve breakdowns.
pro_page.feature_themes_desc: Personalize your timer with Pro-exclusive color themes and visual customization options.
pro_page.feature_support_desc: Get faster responses and direct access to the development team for feature requests.
pro_page.feature_early_access_desc: Be the first to try new features before they're released to the public.

report_user.title: Report {{username}}
report_user.description: If you believe this user has done something worth reporting, please write a short reason below and submit the report. We will review all reports fairly and take action if necessary.
report_user.success: Successfully reported {{username}}. We will take care of the rest
